column5: Hey everyone,  I've noticed there's been a lot of questions about the Bay of Quinte recently. Just thought I'd share some info since I am on it all the time.  There is lots if safe ice out there, but also lots of unsafe areas too. Always spud on the way out to be sure.  I've heard of good fish being caught all over the place from Belleville to Deseronto.  We had another 20+ fish day with the fish ranging from 2-8lbs. We have had all our success fishing flats adjacent to deeper water. Were fishing the 24-28 ft range and getting ALL of our fish on Northland Macho Minnows and Buckshots tipped with live minnows.  If you can get your hands on any of those, grab them!! Every store I've been to (including Bass Pro) is completely sold out.  Overall the ice is pretty good, but always always be safe!
sounds good! Me and a few friends are itching to get out !
Thanks for the updates Jamie !

Thanks Jamie for the great info      I was going to ask you, what depth you were catching them I still don't know which area we are targetting yet but rest assure, will be hunting the 24-28 ft range!!! You mind sharing the color patterns for the Buck Shots??  Have a couple of them.... one is chartreuse and yellow and the other is silver and  blue.  Leechman
Perch and chartruese seem to be the ticket but don't tell anyone!
Thanks ever so much Jamie!!!  My lips are sealed.... promise Hope I get to meet you out there and shake your hand
Super!  Thanks for taking time to share with everyone.

on another note folks theres lots of walleye in the big bay area(point anne)east point NOT WEST(west is high current and just iced over after all that rain we had sooo stay away from there .)  enjoy and be safe  Hawg Hunter
Awesome Hawg Hunter Thank you very much!!!  appreciated

The bit was INSANE today! Best day on the ice the whole season so far! 40+ fish, with six lbers, three 9 lbers and a MONSTER 12 lber!!  I HIGHLY recommend anyone looking for a trophy walleye, to hit up the Bay right now!!  Again, all fish hit in the 24-28 ft range, using Northland Macho Minnows and Buckshots!
I can't wait to get there..... only one dodo and the amigos are coming down
Could somebody swing by and pick me up???
Sure can G     anything for my good friend    Get ready 5:30am
What area of the Bay.....
Save some of those fish for next week Jamie!!!!!  Nice to hear, how big was the party of fishermen/women?  Can't wait to get out...nine days now.

Were fishing the 24-28 ft range and getting ALL of our fish on Northland Macho Minnows and Buckshots tipped with live minnows.  If you can get your hands on any of those, grab them!! Every store I've been to (including Bass Pro) is completely sold out.  Overall the ice is pretty good, but always always be safe!  If anyone is interested fishingworld has lots of buckshots and just received another order of macho minnows.  1/4 to 3/4
Thanks for the update mjack!  Whitespinnerbait... The east side of the bay.  Leechman...no promises! The bite is pretty hot today still!
Just got back from fishing the East side of the BAY .....   Can you say '' Brutal '' and real ''  Nasty ''      WIND ......
Ya man, the wind today was crazzy! It's really nice out now. Cmon evening bite!
wow im jealous.. Me and MikethebassFisher are in we just need to find some one to go with !

The bite slowed down yesterday after the cold front that came through but we still managed 18 fish with the biggest being 11lbs.  The fish are on this morning though! We've iced 7 so far, biggest being 5.5lbs.  Same patterns and depths as before. 24-28 ft, macho minnows and buckshots tipped with live minnows.
